text: Primo Levi (31 July 1919 – 11 April 1987) was an Italian Jewish chemist, writer and Holocaust survivor. He was the author of two novels and many short stories, poems and essays. His best-known book is If This Is a Man, a true story about his time as a prisoner in the Auschwitz concentration camp during World War II. Levi was an atheist and born in Turin. ==Partial bibliography== * Se questo è un uomo (If This Is a Man, 1947 and 1958) * La tregua (The Truce, 1963) * Il sistema periodico (The Periodic Table, 1975) * La chiave a stella (The Wrench, 1978) * La ricerca delle radici (The Search for Roots: A Personal Anthology, 1981) * Se non ora, quando?
